divs: Sighting DetailsI honestly have no idea whats compelling me to share this but my roommate and are were riding on our motorcycles when we witnessed what appeared at first to be a shooting star we were then shocked to see the object change direction and speed until it vanished. This happened in the blink of an eye the only thing I have in favor of my credibility is that we both saw it, and in all honesty what I have against my credibility is that I have witnessed unexplained activity in the sky multiple times. I am starting to teeter on hoping for a logical explanation and the far more delusional thought that some entity is watching me in the sky.
Summary: Riding motorcycles with roomate. Witnessed a light traveling erratically.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Athens
There were no other sightings in Athens on or around August 15th 2012
